description: Complete system overview documenting the ETL architecture, multi-tenant design, and clinical trial data synchronization patterns
Detailed documentation of the DAG-based ETL orchestration system, including dependency management, parallel execution, and failure handling algorithms
Comprehensive documentation of clinical trial data models, JSONB structures, and lineage tracking implementation
End-to-end data flow documentation covering API integration, staging processes, and warehouse loading patterns with multi-tenant considerations
Detailed documentation of Clinical Conductor API integration, including OData query handling, pagination strategies, and production safety controls
